entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 06:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

Temperature: -13.7°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %

Dewpoint: -15.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm south of Hare Bay. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
